cold-outreach.name: Cold Outreach
cold-outreach.subject: Quick question about [Company]
cold-outreach.body:
Hi [FirstName],

I noticed you work at [Company] as a [JobTitle]. I'd love to connect about how we've helped similar companies [achieve goal].

Would you be open to a quick 15-minute call?

Best,
[YourName]

follow-up.name: Follow-up
follow-up.subject: Following up - [Company]
follow-up.body:
Hi [FirstName],

Just following up on my previous email. I wanted to make sure you saw my message about [topic].

Would you be interested in learning more?

Best,
[YourName]

value-proposition.name: Value Proposition
value-proposition.subject: Quick question about [Company]
value-proposition.body:
Hi [FirstName],

I saw that [Company] is [doing something]. We've helped similar companies [achieve result].

I'd love to share how we can help [Company] [specific benefit].

Would you be open to a brief conversation?

Best,
[YourName]

referral.name: Referral Request
referral.subject: Quick favor - [Company]
referral.body:
Hi [FirstName],

I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out because I'm looking to connect with [type of person] at [Company].

Would you be able to make an introduction?

Thanks in advance!

Best,
[YourName]

event.name: Event Invitation
event.subject: Invitation: [Event Name]
event.body:
Hi [FirstName],

I wanted to personally invite you to [event name] on [date]. Given your role at [Company], I think you'd find it valuable.

Would you be interested in attending?

Best,
[YourName]

partnership.name: Partnership Proposal
partnership.subject: Partnership opportunity - [Company]
partnership.body:
Hi [FirstName],

I'm reaching out because I think there's a great opportunity for [Company] and [YourCompany] to work together.

[Brief description of partnership opportunity]

Would you be open to exploring this?

Best,
[YourName]
